name: Cave Heroes
description:
Cave Heroes


Cave Heroes is a challenging idle game where you explore dungeons, fight demons and face powerfull bosses. Descending into the depths of the caves, you will find forgotten knowledge, learn to use Dark Mana, collect powerful loot and absorb the power of the Archdemons.

Improve You Village


Unlock new buildings, hire workers, veterans and archmages and watch your heroes' stats grow. Perform Dark Rituals, idle to accumulate resources, build more buildings and watch as previously invincible enemies are defeated in one blow.

Collect Loot


Fight in quests to collect artifacts, capture Dark Equipment from bosses, complete tasks to achieve Rewards to improve your heroes further.

Tame Pets and Unlock Skins


Play mini games to rescue pets, tame them to get help on your journey. Unlock 20+ powerful and cute skins.

Beat Dark Lord


Reach the Dark Fortress and defeat the Dark Lord, ending his ruthless raids forever.
